java/liquibase/preconditions/RunningAsPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00006 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00007 
00008 import java.sql.SQLException;
00009 
00013 public class RunningAsPrecondition implements Precondition {
00014 
00015     private String username;
00016 
00017     public RunningAsPrecondition() {
00018         username = "";
00019     }
00020 
00021     public void setUsername(String aUserName) {
00022         username = aUserName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getUsername() {
00026         return username;
00027     }
00028 
00029 
00030     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00031         try {
00032             String loggedusername = database.getConnection().getMetaData().getUserName();
00033             if (loggedusername.indexOf('@') >= 0) {
00034                 loggedusername = loggedusername.substring(0, loggedusername.indexOf('@'));
00035             }
00036             if (!username.equalsIgnoreCase(loggedusername)) {
00037                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("RunningAs Precondition failed: expected "+username+", was "+loggedusername, changeLog, this);
00038             }
00039         } catch (SQLException e) {
00040             throw new PreconditionErrorException(e, changeLog, this);
00041         }
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getTagName() {
00045         return "runningAs";
00046     }
00047 
00048 }
